vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Dodan(?) of the Greeks, only mentioned at Gen.10.4; descended from Javan (H3120); along with Elishah (H0473), Tarshish (H8659) and Kittim (H3794); also called Rodanim or Rodanites at 1Ch.1.7;
§ Dodanim or Rodanim = "leaders"
sons or descendants of Javan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendientes de Javán, hijo de Jafet
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
多單 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "領袖"
雅完的兒子或後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
多单 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "领袖"
雅完的儿子或后裔
